text: Vittorio De Angelis (20 September 1962 – 11 June 2015) was an Italian voice actor. He was born in Rome. He was known for being the official dubber of actors Cary Elwes, Kevin James and Matt LeBlanc. He dubbed the voice of Prince Eric in The Little Mermaid as well as Joey Tribbiani in Friends and the spin- off Joey. De Angelis died on 11 June 2015 as a result of a heart attack. He was 52 years of age.È morto a 52 anni il doppiatore romano Vittorio De Angelis (in Italian) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1962 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Italian voice actors Category:Actors from Rome
title: Vittorio De Angelis
